attributes.action: keep schools closed until there is guarantee  teachers & kids safety from cv19
attributes.additional_details:
our children are not guinea pigs and each school needs to produce  plans in conjunction with socal distancing and hygiene.the plans can then be reviewed by parents and teachers so that all concerns are considered before  putting lives at risk.there should be plans about getting the kids in to school picking them up,hygiene at lunches after every sitting how to get the kids out and spray down before the next  sitting comes in.
 schools should reopen togeghetr state  and private.
as it stands private are not opening till september.
attributes.background: schools should remain closed untill you have the  risk assessed all the eventualities and produce a rebust strategy that will ensure that children can maintain  a 2 meter socal distancing following government policy from the start of the day till the end .also that schools hygiene is 100 percent .
